name: Pocket Blaster
description:
Powerful guns, high-quality graphics and hordes of enemies against You! Welcome to Pocket Blaster.
In this roguelike arcade shooter, your main objective is to DEAL A LOT OF DAMAGE! Defeat cool looking monsters. Knock them back, Slam them up, BLAST THEM!
- Fight a lot of armed enemy types with unique behavior
- Easy and intuitive controls. Maneuver between enemies, dash when surrounded or use slow motion ability to plan your next move in split-second
